info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 23 at 1:02AM CDT until July 23 at 1:30AM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 AM CDT FOR CENTRAL LAKE COUNTY... At 101 AM CDT, multiple strong thunderstorms were over or near northern and central Lake County. While the storm that prompted the warning has moved out over Lake Michigan, a couple intensifying thunderstorms over eastern McHenry County are about to move into Lake County. These storms are moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Waukegan, North Chicago, Gurnee, Mundelein, Round Lake Beach, Vernon Hills, Zion, Grayslake, Libertyville, Lake Forest, Round Lake, Wauconda, Fox Lake, Lake Villa, Island Lake, Lindenhurst, Beach Park, Gages Lake, Long Grove and Hawthorn Woods. Including the following interstates... I-94 between mile markers 5 and 17. I-294 between mile markers 5 and 17. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
